author: Dr. Susan Berry
title: Actress Ashley Judd Promotes Abortion Campaign Targeting Pro-Life Lockdown Protesters
description: Actress Ashley Judd promoted NARAL’s new campaign condemning pro-life politicians who are urging an end to coronavirus lockdowns.
content:
Actress and left-wing political activist Ashley Judd tweeted out abortion advocacy group NARALs new campaign Tuesday that condemns, as hypocrites, pro-life politicians who are encouraging an end to coronavirus lockdowns.
If they valued peoples lives, they wo… [+2620 chars]
